<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.96</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Strings </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>[[File:ISO-8859-1.jpg|thumb|right|ISO-8859-1]]Converts the supplied string to all lower case characters fast (could be 3x faster than [[toLower]]). [https://stackoverflow.com/questions/701882/what-is-ansi-format/701920 ANSI] in this case refers to [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO/IEC_8859-1 ISO-8859-1] code page. The command is primary designed to convert characters with [[toArray | codes]] 0...127 however will also convert other characters in 128...255 range as long as they are present in ISO-8859-1 codepage. For Unicode alternative see [[toLower]].</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[toLowerANSI]] string </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> string: [[String]] - string to convert </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - all lower case string </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[toLowerANSI]] "AaBb1"; // returns "aabb1"</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[toUpperANSI]], [[toLower]], [[toString]], [[toArray]], [[toUpper]], [[toFixed]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
